name: adjust_emission_settings
description: Change the emission settings for a specific zone.

zone_id.description: The ID of the zone to adjust settings for.

new_emission_level.description: The new emission level to set, options are 'low', 'moderate', 'high', 'very high'.

name: deactivate_smog_alert
description: Deactivate a city-wide smog alert to notify citizens.

name: get_current_settings
description: Retrieve current settings of the pollution control system in the city.

name: adjust_pollution_control_parameters
description: Adjust the settings of the pollution control system to optimize performance and resources.

air_quality_threshold.description: New air quality threshold to trigger the pollution control mechanisms.

operation_time_hours.description: Number of hours to operate the pollution control systems.

name: get_pollution_data
description: Retrieve recent pollution data to observe current pollution trends.

name: view_documents
description: View the contents of existing documents.

name: adjust_settings
description: Adjust the settings of the pollution control system.

inspection_frequency.description: Frequency of system inspections (e.g., daily, weekly, monthly).

name: update_cleaning_frequency
description: Update the cleaning frequency of a city.

frequency.description: The new frequency to be updated for a week.

name: check_policy
description: Check the corresponding policy for SmartCityWasteManagement.
